title: 有聽六, 七十年代出道嘅英美band/合唱團嘅入嚟

replies.msg:
雖然話有好多人聽過英美一, 兩首hit song, 但係佢哋好多都講唔出啲歌名, 甚至連原唱/作係邊個

所以黃家駒講得好啱, "香港邊有樂壇?"同埋"喺香港大把人都唔識欣賞做音樂幕後嘅一番功勞 (類似)"

大家聽開邊隊band/group嘅作品? 同埋, 佢哋有咩好歌唔錯?

利申: Beatles fan; 佢哋嘅"Yesterday", "A Day in the Life"同"Hello Goodbye"

70s黃金年代

Deep Purple - Soldier of Fortune, Smoke on the Water, Highway Star
Scorpions - Holidays, Wind of Change
Bad Company - Ready for Love, Bad Company
The Animals - House of the Rising Sun, Don't let me be misunderstood
Steve Miller Band - Fly like an eagle
Pink Floyd - Another brick in the wall, money
Suzi Quatro - Stumblin' In, If you can't give me love
Paul McCartney - Band on the run
Santana - Black Magic Woman
Eagles - Hotel California
Queen - Bohemian Rhapsody
Led Zeppelin - Stairway To Heaven, Kashmir
Air Supply計唔計？

quote.msg: Air Supply計唔計？

replies.msg: 流行組合都算, 例如Bee Gees

quote.msg: Air Supply計唔計？

replies.msg:
I'm lying alone with my head on the phone
Thinking of you till it hurts

70s 尾80s頭所以都計

replies.msg: 明白; 我就以編曲行先

有冇邊隊你地係首首都岩聽？
我對音樂涉獵不深 舊band如ac/dc, queen, earthwind&fire, the whispers都淨係比最hit個幾首吸引到 未試過成張album都鍾意
70s仲有好多Disco而家聽番都好有味道

Beatles
Beach Boys
Bob Dylan
Velvet Underground
Scott Walker
bee gees - you should be dance

quote.msg:
有冇邊隊你地係首首都岩聽？
我對音樂涉獵不深 舊band如ac/dc, queen, earthwind&fire, the whispers都淨係比最hit個幾首吸引到 未試過成張album都鍾意

replies.msg:
到目前為止祇得Beatles, 但係Bee Gees同Queen我近排都有聽

順帶一提, 我第一個偶像係Michael Jackson, 後來我發現Bee Gees有啲歌同佢風格好似, 而Freddie Mercury同Jackson台風都好犀利, 音域都一樣咁闊

quote.msg: 70s仲有好多Disco而家聽番都好有味道

replies.msg: Bee Gees嘅"Nights on Broadway", "More Than a Woman"同"Tragedy"都好正😊
dark side of the moon,the wall個啲咁撚行,等d 柒頭皮講得啦,我就suggest time
